channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Outlook
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Outlook

item.title: CVE-2017-0204|2024-08-05T12:55:19.141Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- outlook
item.description: Microsoft Outlook 2007 SP3, Microsoft Outlook 2010 SP2, Microsoft Outlook 2013 SP1, and Microsoft Outlook 2016 allow remote attackers to bypass the Office Protected View via a specially crafted document, aka "Microsoft Office Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability."

item.title: CVE-2017-0207|2024-08-05T12:55:19.278Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- outlook
item.description: Microsoft Outlook for Mac 2011 allows remote attackers to spoof web content via a crafted email with specific HTML tags, aka "Microsoft Browser Spoofing Vulnerability."
